Reviews.Title: As Expected
Reviews.Author: Regina
Reviews.Content: Nice phone, exactly what I expected the Blackberry to be after having a much earlier version several years ago.  The color is a little brighter than expected, more of a metallic magenta, but I'm satisfied with it.  I set up a pay-as-you-go service plan with T-Mobile and had no problems getting started.  The phone requires a regular SIM card (not nano or micro), and if you get a SIM card from T-Mobile, you can then go to their website and activate your account, where you choose what type of plan you want.

Reviews.Title: Blackberry are always nice to have
Reviews.Author: Natalie Highsmith
Reviews.Content: It's a blackberry.  What's not to like?  It functions almost the same as my old blackberry with a few minor changes.

ProductInfo.Name: Tmobile Blackberry 9300 Cell Phone for T-Mobile Smokey Violet Color
